name: Jackson Safety Lightweight MAXVIEW Premium Face Shield - Mask with 370 Speed Dial Ratcheting Headgear, ANSI Z87.1, for Work, Grinding, Cutting - Anti Fog Coating - Clear Tint
short_description: MAXIMUM PROTECTION – Jackson Safety's Maxview Face Shield features an oversized window for maximum face coverage; Integrated side and chin guards protects against splashes and flying debris while an extended crown keeps you safe from overhead hazards
ANTI-FOG – Anti-fog coated window for unobstructed and exceptional optical clarity; Window is replaceable; Remove protective film on window before use
HIGH IMPACT RESISTANT - Window is made of high impact resistant polycarbonate; Crown made of high impact resistant ABS plastic; Designed to be worn with safety glasses

COMFORTABLE FIT – 370 Speed Dial features an oversized ratcheting headgear knob, making it easy to adjust even with gloves on; Quick-Fit rear swivel headband; Fits well with respirators and most goggles
MEETS STANDARDS - Meets ANSI Z87.1+ high impact and CSA Z94.3 standards
product_description: Product Description The MAXVIEW is a premium face shield that features an oversized window that delivers exceptional optical clarity and panoramic view. An integrated side and chin guard protects against splashes and flying debris while the extended crown protects against hazards from above. This combination ensures superior coverage from head to lower neck and side-to-side. The MAXVIEW is highlighted by Jackson Safety's exclusive 370 Speed Dial, which offers the fastest and easiest to use headgear system today. The oversized fine tooth ratcheting headgear knob guarantees a more precise fit without overtightening. it is easy to grab and turn even when wearing gloves. The 370 Speed Dial also features a patented rear swivel adjuster band, instantly delivering a perfect fit every time. Meets or exceeds ANSI Z87.1 and CSA Z94.3 standards. Set Contains: MAXVIEW premium face shield with 370 Speed Dial ratcheting suspension headgear

name: Honeywell Uvex Bionic Face Shield with Clear Polycarbonate Visor and Anti-Fog/Hard Coat (S8510)
short_description: Full shield design provides built-in chin protection and extended top-of-head coverage; protects against falling or flying objects, impacts, chemical splashes and airborne debris; black matte color
Excellent optics provide increased visibility; clear polycarbonate visor with anti-fog/hard coat; comfortable rear cell foam and lightweight, balanced, ergonomic design for extended use
Easy-to-set, ratcheting headgear assures comfortable, secure fit; highly adjustable headgear tilts visor nearer or farther from face for preference and application; 2,784 total possible positions
Easily replaceable visor available in the following options: Clear Uncoated, Clear Anti-Fog/Anti-Scratch, Shade 3.0 and Shade 5.0.; breathable, removable, washable headband
Must be worn with safety eyewear or goggles; fits comfortably with most goggles and respirators; 100% dielectric (no metal parts); meets ANSI Z87 and CSA Z94.3 standards

name: Blue Eagle Aluminum Face Shield Adapter for Full-Brim Hard Hat | Visor Bracket | Silver Color | with 1 Free Replacement High Impact Visor
short_description: INTERNATIONAL STANDARDS — Meets ANSI Z87.1 (US), CE EN166 (Europe), CSA Z94.3 (Canada), AS/NZS 1337.1 (Australia and New Zealand)

IMPACT RESISTANCE (AT EXTREME TEMPERATURE) - Made of extrusion-grade polycarbonate, our face shields can withstand the impact of a 6 mm steel bead traveling at a speed of 268 MPH at extremes of temperatures (from -23°F to +122°F).
IMPACT RESISTANCE (AT ROOM TEMPERATURE) - Tested hundreds of times in the lab, our face shields can withstand the impact of a 6 mm steel ball traveling at a speed of 300 MPH easily.
BEST OPTICAL QUALITY - Tested by ANSI Z87.1 (All Optical Requirements are PASSED) and CE EN 166 (CLASS 1 Optical Level is PASSED).
APPLICATION – Safety Face Shield Adapter Brackets are designed to be used with non-slotted hard hats.
EASY INSTALLATION - The swivel pins of the outer frame hold the face shield and the inner frame attaches securely to the cap-style hard hat.

name: NoCry Safety Face Shield Mask for Work with Premium Anti Fog and Anti Scratch Technology — Durable ANSI Z87.1 Certified Grinding Face Shield with Extreme Impact Resistance
short_description: COMPLETE PROTECTION — Pairing anti-fog and scratch-resistant goggles with a tough polycarbonate torch face shield, this unbeatable duo has you covered from splashes, dust, and debris. And they are built to resist high-speed impacts, even in extreme temperatures.
ANTI FOG VENTILATION SYSTEM – With clever angled vents, the airflow-optimized design of these shield goggles kicks fog to the curb while sealing the inside of the goggles for added protection.

FITS OVER GLASSES — Rocking prescription glasses? Fit them under the wide panoramic lens with ease. And they’re also ANSI Z87.1-certified and OSHA-approved, this cutting grass goggles with face shield is packed with UV protection for those sunny workdays.

SUPERIOR COMFORT — Crafted for all-day wear, these feather-light face shield goggles have a soft TPR seal and adjustable strap for a tight, comfortable fit every time. And when thirst strikes? Just pop off the shield and sip away.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Built to outlast your wildest workdays, and backed by a lifetime warranty, this cutting torch face shield will be your ultimate sidekick for the long haul. We're all about providing you with products that defy time.

name: Full Face Shield for Yard Work & Woodworking, Wide View Clear Visor with Anti-Fog Coating, Breathable Bottom Design, Adjustable Headband
short_description: Wide View Visor with Anti-Fog Coating –Clear curved visor provides full face coverage and a wide field of view. The upgraded anti-fog coating is designed to help reduce fogging during normal working conditions, improving visibility while cutting, sanding, or trimming outdoors.

Designed for Yard Work & Woodworking Tasks –Helps block flying debris such as grass clippings, wood chips, dust, and small particles during grinding, lawn mowing, garden trimming, DIY projects, and home improvement work.

Breathable Bottom Design for Comfort –Bottom openings improve airflow to reduce heat and stuffiness during extended use. Includes a replaceable dust interception pad designed for light dusty environments to help reduce direct exposure to larger particles (no filtration efficiency claims).

Soft Silicone Seal & Adjustable Fit –Features a soft silicone edge and flexible clear visor for comfortable skin contact. The adjustable elastic headband provides a secure and stable fit for different head sizes during active movement.(6.69 × 6.8 in)

Not Designed to Be Worn with Glasses –This full face shield uses a fixed-size structure and is not intended to be worn over eyewear. Fit may vary depending on frame size. Please check product dimensions before purchase. For general non-medical use only.
